class.name: tidyup_grasp_actions/action_executor_grasp_object
class.description: An action executor that grasps an object.

class.name: tidyup_grasp_actions/action_executor_post_grasp_position
class.description: An action executor that moves an arm to post grasp position.

class.name: tidyup_grasp_actions/action_executor_tuck_arms
class.description: An action executor that tucks/untucks the arms.

class.name: tidyup_grasp_actions/action_executor_detect_graspable_objects
class.description: An action executor that calls object detection for grasping.
